response.explain: The error occurred because the "large_object" was not properly identified and registered before moving the robot towards it. The code attempted to move the robot to an undefined object, which caused the error.
response.subtask:
(1) Find the teaspoon.
(2) Register the teaspoon.
(3) Find a large object that is near the teaspoon.
(4) Register the large object.
(5) Move to the large object.
(6) Grasp the teaspoon.
(7) Find the bowl.
(8) Register the bowl.
(9) Move to the bowl.
(10) Put the teaspoon in the bowl.
